answers.answer: my 3 yr old daughter has also had a 103F fever everother day for the past three days herself. runny nose, but happy and energetic. I plan on taking her to the doctors soon if she gets worse. hopefully you'll get feed back soon

question: hi my daughter is 4 years old and for the pass 5 days shes had a fever headache loss of appetite congestion with runny nose watery eyes red throat toung hurts its not strep throat not the flu not pnemonia nothing with diabetes trying to tell me viral but i dont think so wondering if anybody would have an idea or suggestion on what it could be id appreciate a concerned mother thank you
title: 4 yr old
